full_text: From: [b6, b7C] [@bop.gov] Sent: Saturday, August 10, 2019 1:57 PM To: [b6, b7C] [b6, b7C]@usdoj.gov>; [b6, b7C] [b6, b7C]@usdoj.gov>; [b6, b7C] Subject: United States v. Jeffrey Epstein Good afternoon, Enclosed please find official notification from Warden N'Diaye regarding Mr. Epstein's passing. As the investigation is ongoing, we have no further details at this time. We will continue to keep you updated as more information is available. Thank you, [b6, b7C] Supervisory Staff Attorney CLC New York Metropolitan Correctional Center 150 Park Row New York, New York 10007 p: (646)836-[b6] f: (646)836-7665 DOJ-OGR-00023636

text_blocks.content: From: [b6, b7C] [@bop.gov] Sent: Saturday, August 10, 2019 1:57 PM To: [b6, b7C] [b6, b7C]@usdoj.gov>; [b6, b7C] [b6, b7C]@usdoj.gov>; [b6, b7C] Subject: United States v. Jeffrey Epstein

Good afternoon, Enclosed please find official notification from Warden N'Diaye regarding Mr. Epstein's passing. As the investigation is ongoing, we have no further details at this time. We will continue to keep you updated as more information is available.
Thank you, [b6, b7C] Supervisory Staff Attorney CLC New York Metropolitan Correctional Center 150 Park Row New York, New York 10007 p: (646)836-[b6] f: (646)836-7665

additional_notes: The email contains redactions of personal names and contact information. The document is an official email regarding the passing of Jeffrey Epstein.
